"Using high brightness levels for long periods may cause eye strain and increase battery consumption. Tap OK to allow the brightness to be increased above safe levels."

Drag the quick setting buttons to the area above to add them to the quick settings panel.
Unable to remove button. Minimum number of buttons (%d) reached.
To use the VoLTE service, subscribe to VoLTE. Contact your service provider for details.

Flight mode allows you to turn off calling, messaging and data network features. It also turns off connectivity features such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. To use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, turn them on in Settings or on the notification panel.
Do not disturb

"Use Wi-Fi networks to make and receive calls anywhere, without connecting to a mobile network.
The Wi-Fi calling icon will appear in the notification panel as shown below while the service is available."
Wi-Fi Calling Activation
Wi-Fi Calling lets you call and text while on a Wi-Fi Network. Usage will be deducted from the minute and text message buckets in your Wireless plan. Click below to Activate.
Please connect to a Wi-Fi network to register for Wi-Fi Calling.
Activate
Show control on top
Outdoor mode
Increase the screen brightness for %1$d minutes. If the screen is turned on when the %2$d minutes have elapsed, Outdoor mode will remain enabled until the screen is turned off.
Outdoor mode will maximize screen brightness for best viewing in sunlight. If the screen is not in use, screen brightness will return to the previous setting in 15 minutes.
Add user
Guest
Delete guest
Guest settings
You can restore your previous settings for the guest profile or use default settings.
Yes, continue
Email

Open settings

"Unable to detect a SIM card. Your device will be unable to perform actions such as making calls and connecting to mobile networks.
To protect against water damage, make sure the SIM/SD card tray is firmly sealed."
To protect against water damage, make sure the SIM/SD card tray is firmly sealed.
Slow charging
Incomplete connection
For faster charging, use the charger that came with your device and make sure it is properly connected.
Make sure the charger is properly connected. Use the charger that came with the device.

"If you do not enter the correct pattern in the next attempt, your phone will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you do not draw the correct series of directions in the next attempt, your tablet will automatically be reset to factory settings and all information on the tablet will be erased.
If your tablet is reset, you may need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this tablet to be able to use it again."
